message.body: Hi! Excited for yr trip. I forgot I said yes to playing a small punk poetry night tmrw, starts at 9-12. It'll be smoke and beers but prob. Alot of fun.
And if yr way tired, that's fine too! Cleaning the sheets as we speak :)
Awesome! I just want to see you so whatever we do will be good!!! Plus I get to see you play whatever it is that you play!!
